Jalan Rusak di Jalur Wisata Lombok Utara Segera Diperbaiki
04 Nov 2019, 16:54 by Harianto Nukman


Foto: Harianto Nukman/detikcom

Lombok Utara - Jalan provinsi di jalur Pusuk yang kondisinya rusak parah akan segera diperbaiki. Jalur wisata yang menuju Kabupaten Lombok Utara itu diduga rusak akibat longsor tahun lalu.H Iswandi, Penjabat Sekretaris Daerah (Pj Sekda) Provinsi NTB, langsung terjun ke lokasi jalan Pusuk yang rusak di Dusun Bentek, Desa Pemenang Barat, Kecamatan Pemenang, Kabupaten Lombok Utara (KLU), Senin (4/11/2019).Iswandi memastikan, Pemprov NTB akan segera memperbaiki bahu jalan atau talud di KM 17,2 Jalan Provinsi jurusan Rembiga - Pemenang itu. "Jalan yang rusak karena longsor sejak gempa tahun lalu segera ditangani," ujarnya saat meninjau lokasi.


Jalan rusak di Lombok Utara Foto: Harianto Nukman/detikcom

Langkah sigap perbaikan jalan tersebut akan dilakukan dalam waktu dekat. Pemprov NTB tidak perlu menunggu tahun anggaran berikutnya. Hal yang dikhawatirkan, jika terlambat ditangani akan bisa memakan korban jiwa.Menurut dia, penanganan perlu disegerakan karena musim hujan juga akan segera tiba. Apabila dibiarkan, kerusakan bisa merembet dan semakin parah. "Tidak tunggu sampai tahun depan. Secepatnya diperbaiki."Untuk saat ini, pihaknya prioritaskan keselamatan para pengendara. Pemerintah ingin memastikan tidak ada kecelakaan yang terjadi. Mengingat, jalur tersebut cukup padat kendaraan sehingga rawan terjadinya kecelakaan lalu lintas.Selain melakukan langkah jangka pendek, upaya jangka panjang tetap menjadi prioritas. "Selanjutnya dilakukan penyelesaian secara fisik, itu akan dituntaskan oleh dinas PUPR. Penyiapan rencana secara teknis dan anggarannya akan dputuskan besok," katanya.Simak Video "Protes Jalan Rusak, Warga Polman Tanam Batang Pisang di Jalanan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sym/krs)

Damaged Roads in North Lombok Tourist Paths Will Be Repaired Soon
Nov 04 2019, 16:54 by Harianto Nukman


Photo: Harianto Nukman / detikcom

North Lombok - The provincial road in the Pusuk line which is seriously damaged will be repaired soon. The tourist route leading to the North Lombok Regency was allegedly damaged by a landslide last year. H Iswandi, Acting Regional Secretary (Pj Sekda) of NTB Province, immediately jumped into the location of the damaged Pusuk road in Bentek Hamlet, West Winner Village, Pemenang District, North Lombok Regency (KLU), Monday (11/04/2019). Isswandi confirmed that the NTB Provincial Government will immediately repair the shoulder of the road or talud in KM 17.2 in the Rembiga Department of Tourism - the winner. "Roads damaged by landslides since last year's earthquake were immediately handled," he said while reviewing the location.


Damaged roads in North Lombok Photo: Harianto Nukman / detikcom

The step is swiftly repairing the road will be done in the near future. The NTB Provincial Government does not need to wait for the next fiscal year. The thing that is worried, if it is handled too late, it will take lives. According to him, handling needs to be hastened because the rainy season will also soon arrive. If left unchecked, the damage can spread and get worse. "Do not wait until next year. As soon as possible repaired." For now, it prioritizes the safety of motorists. The government wants to ensure that no accidents occur. Given, the lane is quite dense vehicles so prone to traffic accidents. In addition to taking short-term steps, long-term efforts remain a priority. "Furthermore, a physical settlement is carried out, it will be completed by the PUPR service. The preparation of the technical plan and budget will be decided tomorrow," he said.
